TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ThreadStart extends System.MulticastDelegate
type ThreadStart = delegate of unit -> unit

summary.span: 表示在 上执行的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that executes on a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建托管线程时，在该线程上执行的方法由 传递给构造函数的委托或委托表示 。When a managed thread is created, the method that executes on the thread is represented by a delegate or a delegate that is passed to the constructor. 在调用方法之前，不会开始执行线程 。The thread does not begin executing until the method is called. 执行从或委托表示的方法的第一行开始 。Execution begins at the first line of the method represented by the or delegate. > [!NOTE] > 在创建线程时，Visual Basic 和 c # 用户可以省略 或 委托构造函数。Visual Basic and C# users can omit the or delegate constructor when creating a thread. 在 Visual Basic 中，在将 `AddressOf` 方法传递给构造函数时使用运算符 ; 例如， `Dim t As New Thread(AddressOf ThreadProc)` 。In Visual Basic, use the `AddressOf` operator when passing your method to the constructor; for example, `Dim t As New Thread(AddressOf ThreadProc)`. 在 c # 中，只需指定线程过程的名称。In C#, simply specify the name of the thread procedure. 编译器选择正确的委托构造函数。The compiler selects the correct delegate constructor. > > 对于 c + +，从 .NET Framework 2.0 开始，为 静态方法创建委托只需要一个参数：由类名限定的回调方法的地址。For C++, starting with .NET Framework 2.0, creating a delegate for a static method requires only one parameter: the address of the callback method, qualified by the class name. 在早期版本中，为静态方法创建委托时需要两个参数：零 (null) 和方法地址。In earlier versions two parameters were required when creating a delegate for a static method: zero (null) and the method address. 对于实例方法，所有版本都需要两个参数：实例变量和方法地址。For an instance method, all versions require two parameters: the instance variable and the method address. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示用于创建委托并将 委托与实例方法和静态方法一起使用的语法。The following code example shows the syntax for creating and using a delegate with an instance method and with a static method. 有关演示如何创建委托的另一个简单示例 ，请参阅 方法重载。For another simple example that demonstrates how to create a delegate, see the method overload. 有关创建线程的详细信息，请参阅 [在启动时创建线程和传递数据](/dotnet/standard/threading/creating-threads-and-passing-data-at-start-time)。For more information about thread creation, see [Creating Threads and Passing Data at Start Time](/dotnet/standard/threading/creating-threads-and-passing-data-at-start-time). [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ThreadStart2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ThreadStart2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ThreadStart2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ThreadStart2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ThreadStart2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ThreadStart2/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Creating threads and passing data at start time
